title: Free fatty acids appear to rewire cells to promote obesity-related breast cancer

title_detail.value: Free fatty acids appear to rewire cells to promote obesity-related breast cancer

summary: Free fatty acids in the blood are linked with higher rates of estrogen-receptor positive breast cancer in obese postmenopausal women, according to a new study.

summary_detail.value: Free fatty acids in the blood are linked with higher rates of estrogen-receptor positive breast cancer in obese postmenopausal women, according to a new study.
